lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Heeelllloooooo…

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Don’t mind my looks today, I am kinda out of it.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: My study sessions have been going swimmingly, But I’m learning that I can’t pull all-nighters like I used to.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: And so, I am in a dire need for something that will put me back on my feet.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Give me the most bitter and the most intense brew you have. Don’t pull any punches.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: This is it?

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I know for a fact that this isn’t it. You can do better than that!

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I asked for the most bitter and most intense tea that you can make. And I ain’t gonna move an inch until I get one.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Uggghhh, that one packs a punch! Just what I needed! Much appreciated!

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Oh wow, okay, okay. Now we’re talking. I like this one much better.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: It’s kind of impressive how much variety you can get between different teas. I mean, this is just a leaf extract, no?

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Yet people out there do different things to those leaves and somehow at the end you get so many different end products.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Say, can I confide in you?

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I know I should be letting go of my ex. I want only the best for her. But still, I can’t help but be worried about her, you know?

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I’ve been thinking about it since yesterday… and I’m starting to think I know why she was so angry at me.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: It must be because I’m so quick to plan things ahead.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: And when she wanted to do something, I could come up with ten ways how things could go wrong.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: So we would always end up doing the least disaster-prone things together.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: She must have taken this as “it’s my way or the highway” kind of thing.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: But it’s obviously not! It’s just that I take everything into consideration.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: This is how they say, I guess. 'Road to hell is paved with good intentions.'

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Our history goes back so far. I taught her how to do makeup. We picked out an entire wardrobe for her, so that she feels her most authentic self.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Oh and I have this tattoo on my left forearm. It’s a swan. She picked it out for me.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I hope Willow is doing well…

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: ~Oh, I must have been rambling. Sorry.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Thanks for listening. You’re great for that. See you!
